sentences.english: Sulfur dyes stones in a yellowish color.
Chlorobenzene sulfonyl chloride was synthesized with chlorobenzene as raw material.
sentences.chinese: 以氯苯为原料，合成了对氯苯磺酰氯。

sentences.english: Aim Synthesis of nitrogen heterocycle ferrocenesulfonyl amide was studied.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究氮杂环二茂铁磺酰胺类化合物的合成。

sentences.english: Man-made synthetic products such as tartrazine.
sentences.chinese: 人造合成产品例如酒石磺。

sentences.english: Which issues do you feel future trials with fondaparinux will focus on?
sentences.chinese: 您觉得将来的磺达肝癸钠试验将集中关注哪些问题？

sentences.english: The method of sulfomethylation modification of bayberry tannin extract was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究了毛杨梅栲胶的磺甲基化改性方法。

sentences.english: Both of those studies confirmed the safety and efficacy of fondaparinux.
sentences.chinese: 这些研究均证实了磺达肝癸钠的安全性和有效性。

sentences.english: Benzenesulfonyl choride was synthesized with benzene as raw material.
